scripts.build: npm run build:theme && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w admin && npm run build -w buyer && npm run build -w payment && npm run build -w seller && npm run build -w shell
scripts.dev: npm run dev:theme && npm run dev:apps
scripts.dev:apps: concurrently "npm run dev -w admin" "npm run dev -w buyer" "npm run dev -w payment" "npm run dev -w seller" "npm run dev -w shell"
scripts.dev:all: npm run build && npm run dev
